concepts.name: Univariate Analysis
concepts.golden_answer: Univariate analysis examines a single variable to describe its characteristics and identify patterns in data.

concepts.name: Measures of Central Tendency
concepts.golden_answer: Measures of central tendency, like mean, median, and mode, help summarize the data.

concepts.name: Measures of Dispersion
concepts.golden_answer: Measures of dispersion, like variance, standard deviation, quantiles, and range, indicate how spread out the values are. This type of analysis is essential in statistics and research to understand data distributions and make informed comparisons between variables.
